variable.name: AREDSDTH
variable.description: WAS THE DEATH IDENTIFIED DURING AREDS (ALL PARTICIPANTS)

variable.name: CLASS
variable.value: Exact match on SSN, first name, middle initial, last names, sex, state of birth, birth month and birth year
SSN matches on at least seven digits and one or more of the other items from Class 1 may or may not match
SSN unknown but eight (items) or more of first name, middle initial, last name, birth day, birth month, birth year, sex, race, marital status, or state of birth match
Same as Class 3 but less than eight items match
SSN is known but does not match

variable.name: DEATHTIME
variable.description: YEARS FROM RANDOMIZATION TO DATE OF DEATH (ALL PARTICIPANTS)

variable.name: ICD10
variable.description: NDI-ASSIGNED ICD10 CODE FOR UNDERLYING CAUSE OF DEATH (ICD10 codes are provided for deaths occurring in 1999 and beyond. ICD9 codes are provided for all other deaths.) (ALL PARTICIPANTS)
